snippet: Amos Yee, 16, was arrested after posting a video critical of the city-state’s founding father called “Lee Kuan Yew Is Finally Dead!’’
abstract: Amos Yee, 16-year-old blogger who posted video criticizing Singapore founder Lee Kuan Yew, is convicted on charges of obscenity and insulting religious feelings.
lead_paragraph: Amos Yee, 16, was arrested after posting a video critical of the city-state’s founding father called “Lee Kuan Yew Is Finally Dead!’’

headline.main: Singapore Convicts Teenager of Obscenity and Insulting Religious Feelings
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Singapore: Conviction for Criticism
